name: JustCommodity Software Solutions
tag_list: cxc, ctrm, physical-commodity, trading, trader, contraxcentral, risk-management, hedging, futures, forex, options, swaps, vessel-charter, international-trade, physical-delivery, soft-commodities, palm-oil, rubber, rspo, coal, bunker-oil, cocoa, soybean, s
overview:
JustCommodity develops and implements Commodity Trading and Risk Management software solutions for physical commodity traders.

Incorporated since 2002, JustCommodity builds industry-focused software solutions for trading commodities by meeting the real business challenges of its clients.

JustCommodity’s services include specialised consulting and advisory services on industry best practices, training and education, software implementation and software support globally.

It’s flagship product - ContraXcentral (CxC) - is a comprehensive, integrated, Web-based Commodity Trading and Risk Management (“CTRM”) platform to manage end to end contract lifecycles. CxC eases trade entry, enforces checks and balances at every stage of the trade, automates counterparty documentation, streamlines logistics and improves tracking and accuracy of settlements.

CxC offers a comprehensive Risk Management framework to control price, volumetric, operational, counterparty, and forex risks. This cutting edge solution, employing the latest in software technology, is complemented by tools like Management Dashboards, Ad-hoc Analytics, Report writer, Workflow, Document Management, Connectivity, Security and Audit Trail offering flexibility and extendibility to the solution.
